languages.text: "Второй вопрос, беспокоящий ваших слуг — кто из ваших ближайших спутников удостоится чести стоять по правую и левую руку от вас во время церемонии?"

traits.locale_text: "Второй вопрос, беспокоящий ваших слуг — как им надлежит принять ваших почтенных гостей? В каком духе украсить ваш дворец, какие забавы будут вам по сердцу и какое впечатление вы хотите произвести?"

languages.text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"
languages.original_text: "Второй вопрос, беспокоящий ваших слуг — кто из ваших ближайших спутников удостоится чести стоять по правую и левую руку от вас во время церемонии?"

traits.locale_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — how are they to receive your esteemed guests? What should be the theme of your palace's decorations, what amusements would be to your taste, and what impression do you wish to make?"
"The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"
"The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"
"The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"
"The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

languages.text: 「もうひとつは――式典の間、陛下の脇に立つ栄誉を与える特別な側近を2名選んでいただきたいのです」
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: 「もうひとつは――式典の間、陛下の脇に立つ栄誉を与える特別な側近を2名選んでいただきたいのです」

languages.text: “需要您拿主意的第二件事情是——您希望由谁来陪伴您完成这场典礼？请从您最亲密的同伴之中挑选两位。”
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: “需要您拿主意的第二件事情是——您希望由谁来陪伴您完成这场典礼？请从您最亲密的同伴之中挑选两位。”

languages.text: «El segundo aspecto por el que sus sirvientes quieren preguntarle es este: ¿qué dos de sus acompañantes recibirán el honor de estar a su lado durante la ceremonia?».
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: «El segundo aspecto por el que sus sirvientes quieren preguntarle es este: ¿qué dos de sus acompañantes recibirán el honor de estar a su lado durante la ceremonia?».

languages.text: « Quant au deuxième point : parmi vos compagnons, lesquels auront l'honneur de se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie ? Vous ne pouvez en choisir que deux. »
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: « Quant au deuxième point : parmi vos compagnons, lesquels auront l'honneur de se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie ? Vous ne pouvez en choisir que deux. »

languages.text: "Die zweite Frage Eurer Diener lautet: Welche beiden Eurer engsten Gefährten werden die Ehre haben, bei der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite zu stehen?"
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: "Die zweite Frage Eurer Diener lautet: Welche beiden Eurer engsten Gefährten werden die Ehre haben, bei der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite zu stehen?"

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlarınızın aklındaki ikinci konu, hangi iki yoldaşınızın merasim sırasında yanınızda durma şerefine nail olacağı."
languages.original_text: "The second matter on your servants' minds is — which two of your closest companions will be given the honour of standing by your side during the ceremony?"

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarınızın aklındaki ikinci konu, hangi iki yoldaşınızın merasim sırasında yanınızda durma şerefine nail olacağı."
